Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote") local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=204023449"
local FriendlyFire = false
local ArrowMeshData = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=204023415" local ArrowTextureData = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=204023580"
local AttackAble = true local AttackReloadTime = 1.5 local AttackReloadTimeMax = 1.5 local AttackReloadTimeMin = 0.08 local AttackReloadTimeDecrease = 0.4 local AttackReloadIncreaseRate = AttackReloadTimeDecrease/(AttackReloadTimeMax + 0.5) local AttackRoarThreshold = AttackReloadTimeDecrease local AttackLastReloadTime = 0 local AttackDamage = 4 local AttackSpeed = 128 local AttackArrows = {}
local LoopConnection = nil local Heartbeat = game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat
--returns the wielding player of this tool function getPlayer() local char = Tool.Parent return game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) end
--helpfully checks a table for a specific value function contains(t, v) for _, val in pairs(t) do if val == v then return true end end return false end
--tags a human for the ROBLOX KO system function tagHuman(human) local tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") tag.Value = getPlayer() tag.Name = "creator" tag.Parent = human game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(tag) end
--used by checkTeams function sameTeam(otherHuman) local player = getPlayer() local otherPlayer = game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(otherHuman.Parent) if player and otherPlayer then return player.TeamColor == otherPlayer.TeamColor end return false end
--use this to determine if you want this human to be harmed or not, returns boolean function checkTeams(otherHuman) return not (sameTeam(otherHuman) and not FriendlyFire) end
function loop(dt) AttackReloadTime = AttackReloadTime + AttackReloadIncreaseRate * dt if AttackReloadTime > AttackReloadTimeMax then AttackReloadTime = AttackReloadTimeMax end
if AttackLastReloadTime > AttackRoarThreshold and AttackReloadTime < AttackRoarThreshold then Handle.Roar:Play() end
AttackLastReloadTime = AttackReloadTime end
function createArrow() local part = Instance.new("Part") part.FormFactor = "Custom" part.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 3) part.TopSurface = "Smooth" part.BottomSurface = "Smooth" part.CanCollide = false
local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId = ArrowMeshData mesh.TextureId = ArrowTextureData mesh.Parent = part
local lift = Instance.new("BodyForce") lift.force = Vector3.new(0, 196.2, 0) * part:GetMass() * 0.7 lift.Parent = part
local projectileScript = Tool.Projectile:Clone() projectileScript.Disabled = false projectileScript.Parent = part
if AttackReloadTime < AttackRoarThreshold then local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Size = 1 fire.Parent = part end
return part end
function onLeftDown(mousePos) if not AttackAble then return end
AttackAble = false delay(AttackReloadTime, function() AttackAble = true end) AttackReloadTime = AttackReloadTime - AttackReloadTimeDecrease if AttackReloadTime < AttackReloadTimeMin then AttackReloadTime = AttackReloadTimeMin end
local arrow = createArrow() arrow.CFrame = CFrame.new((Handle.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0.2, -2)).p, mousePos) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -arrow.Size.Z/2) arrow.Velocity = arrow.CFrame.lookVector * AttackSpeed
local touched touched = arrow.Touched:connect(function(part) if part:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) then return end if contains(AttackArrows, part) then return end
arrow.Projectile:Destroy()
local w = Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0 = part w.Part1 = arrow w.C0 = part.CFrame:toObjectSpace(arrow.CFrame) w.Parent = w.Part0
touched:disconnect()
if part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = part.Parent.Humanoid if checkTeams(human) then tagHuman(human) human:TakeDamage(AttackDamage) end end end)
table.insert(AttackArrows, arrow) arrow.Parent = workspace game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(arrow, 1.5)
local sound = Handle.Shot sound.Pitch = math.random(90, 110)/100 sound:Play() end
function onRemote(player, func, ...) if player ~= getPlayer() then return end
if func == "LeftDown" then onLeftDown(...) end end
function onEquip() onUnequip()
LoopConnection = Heartbeat:connect(loop) end
function onUnequip() if LoopConnection then LoopConnection:disconnect() end
AttackReloadTime = AttackReloadTimeMax end
Remote.OnServerEvent:connect(onRemote) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip)

local Player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer local UIS = game:GetService("UserInputService") local Mouse = Player:GetMouse() local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote") local Tracks = {} local InputType = Enum.UserInputType
local BeganConnection, EndedConnection
function playAnimation(animName, ...) if Tracks[animName] then Tracks[animName]:Play() else local anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(animName) if anim and Tool.Parent and Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then Tracks[animName] = Tool.Parent.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(anim) playAnimation(animName, ...) end end end
function stopAnimation(animName) if Tracks[animName] then Tracks[animName]:Stop() end end
function inputBegan(input) if input.UserInputType == InputType.MouseButton1 then Remote:FireServer("LeftDown", Mouse.Hit.p) end end
function inputEnded(input) if input.UserInputType == InputType.MouseButton1 then Remote:FireServer("LeftUp") end end
function onRemote(func, ...) if func == "PlayAnimation" then playAnimation(...) elseif func == "StopAnimation" then stopAnimation(...) end end
function onEquip() BeganConnection = UIS.InputBegan:connect(inputBegan) EndedConnection = UIS.InputEnded:connect(inputEnded) end
function onUnequip() if BeganConnection then BeganConnection:disconnect() BeganConnection = nil end
if EndedConnection then EndedConnection:disconnect() EndedConnection = nil end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip) Remote.OnClientEvent:connect(onRemote)

local Projectile = script.Parent local Heartbeat = game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat
while Heartbeat:wait() do Projectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(Projectile.Position, Projectile.Position + Projectile.Velocity) end
